puppeteer:Lemegeton.NAME: Lemegeton
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card, replace it with a random card. The cost remains the same.

puppeteer:SeaCrystal.NAME: Sea Crystal
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw until your hand is full. At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP for each card in your hand.
#yDolls no longer lose #yCharge at the end of each turn.
